snippet: The Gavitt Tipoff Games, named for the former Big East commissioner Dave Gavitt, will feature at least eight matchups and will be held annually until 2022.
lead_paragraph: The Gavitt Tipoff Games, named for the former Big East commissioner Dave Gavitt, will feature at least eight matchups and will be held annually until 2022.

headline.main: Big East and Big Ten Announce an Annual Series Beginning in 2015
headline.print_headline: Big East and Big Ten Announce an Annual Series Beginning in 2015
